name: NPN Transistor (TO-92)
description: General-purpose NPN transistor in TO-92 package. Use for switching loads that exceed MCU pin current capacity (e.g., driving IR LEDs at 100mA). Base connects to MCU digital/PWM pin through a base resistor (~1kΩ). Collector to load, emitter to ground.

pins.label: Emitter
pins.description: Emitter. Connect to ground for common-emitter switching.

pins.label: Base
pins.description: Base. Control pin — connect to MCU output through a 1kΩ base resistor.

pins.label: Collector
pins.description: Collector. Connect to load (e.g., LED cathode). Current flows from collector to emitter when base is driven.
